## R Markdown

```{r cars}
library(readxl)
Barriers <- read_excel("~/Downloads/Barriers.xlsx")
View(Barriers)
```

```{r}
#Item Difficulty-- item difficulty is simply the mean score for an item
round(colMeans(Barriers, na.rm = T), 2)

```



```{r}
#Item discrimination 
discrim(Barriers[,3:15])

```


```{r}
#Cronbach's Alpha
alpha(Barriers[,3:15])
```
